ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ideas?
ygData.msgSnippet: I d suggest buffing.  The ogre shamans throw some spells so resists would be good.  I doubt you d be able to taunt anything off the druid s if they nuke
ygData.messageBody:
I'd suggest buffing. The ogre shamans throw some spells so resists would be
good. I doubt you'd be able to taunt anything off the druid's if they nuke
heavily anyhow, unless you play Lullaby which would of course only last
until you completed committing suicide. Largo's would also be good to slow
the ogre's attack speed.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Wallace Elliott [mailto:dbe@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 06, 2001 2:35 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Ideas?



Going to hunt the Ogre camp in WK tonight.
I'm just 25 but my guild buds (2 35 druids and a 39
ranger ) want me to come along? Any ideas on how
to stay alive without just running all the time. 8) Or any strategy
on the camp.
Teien Truescale
Prexus
